shlokas:
mahAsvAmIti vikhyAtastvaSTaSaSTO jagadguruH.hArItE'nvaya udbhUta utkRSTE nAma dhAmani..25..
paJcOnE varSasAhasrapaJcakE vigatE kalau.jayavarSE vRSE mAsi maitrarkSE kRSNapakSakE..26..
pratipattithimadhyAhnE svAminAthEti kIrtitaH.mahAlakSmIsubrahmaNyadampatyOstapasaH phalam..27..
rujA'pahRtadEhatvE pUrvayOrgurunAthayOH.tadAjJayA sa sannyastO vayasyUnatrayOdazE..28..
candrazEkharEti puNyanAma bibhrat sa AzramI.sarvajJamUrtistriryAtrAM bhAratasyAcarat padA..29..
pratyakSaM daivataM bhUtvA dharmE cAkRSya mArdavAt.lOkAn samanujagrAha varSANAM zatakaM zubham..30..
kAJcyAM vidEhakaivalyaM prApadyata munIzvaraH.zrImukhE mArgakRSNE sa dvAdazyAm aparAhNakE..31..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
